Battering Ram.card_desc: [Shoulder Bash] Gain 90% Damage Reduction while Channeling Shoulder Bash.

Battlement.card_desc: [Siege Shield] Increase the duration of Siege Shield by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Brawl.card_desc: [Kinetic Burst] Heal for {scale=80|80} Health over 2s for each enemy hit by Kinetic burst.

Castle Forged.card_desc: [Kinetic Burst] Reduce Cooldown of Kinetic Burst by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Fortress Breaker.card_desc: [Siege Shield] Siege Shield moves 80% slower, has 3000 more Health, and is 50% larger.

Furious Charge.card_desc: [Shoulder Bash] Increase the knockback distance of Shoulder Bash by {scale=8|8}%

Gate Crasher.card_desc: [Shoulder Bash] Reduce the Cooldown of Shoulder Bash by {scale=1.2|1.2}s.

Heavy Metal.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your base maximum Health by {scale=150|150}.

Percussion.card_desc: [Kinetic Burst] Increase the knockback distance of Kinetic Burst by {scale=8|8}%

Ramparts.card_desc: [Siege Shield] Reduce the Cooldown of Siege Shield by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Siege Engine.card_desc: [Kinetic Burst] Reduce the cooldown of Siege Shield by {scale=1|1}s for hitting an enemy with Kinetic Burst.

Slug Shot.card_desc: [Weapon] Your weapon shots travel 50% faster and 100% further but no longer explode.

Thrive.card_desc: [Shoulder Bash] Heal for {scale=175|175} Health when hitting with Shoulder Bash.

Trebuchet.card_desc: [Siege Shield] Activating Siege Shield generates {scale=1|1} Ammo.

Vanguard.card_desc: [Shoulder Bash] Gain {scale=8|8}% Damage Reduction for 2s after using Shoulder Bash.

Watchtower.card_desc: [Siege Shield] Increase the Health of Siege Shield by {scale=250|250}.
